item.title: Customs
item.dc:creator: @mostwanted8 mostwanted8
item.description:
@mostwanted8 wrote:

its not just easy even a baby can do it anyways
in your source files you have to find item.java
then look for this as an example public static int amulets[] = {4035,6577, 10519, 10413, 11204, 11205, 1120611146,11147, 11148, 11149, 11150, 11151, 11152, 11141, 6857, 6859, 6861,6863, 1724, 1718, 6585, 86, 774, 87, 295, 421, 552, 589, 1478,1692, 1694, 1696, 1698, 1722, 1702, 1704, 1706, 1708, 1710, 1712,1725, 1727, 1729, 1731, 4021, 4081, 4250, 4677, 6040, 6041, 6208,11274, 11275, 11276, 11273, 11941 };
thats for amulets you just add the code between them then save and compile
here ill add an item lets say ID is 150000 we add it like this

try that any errors replay
